text: Estonian Youth Song and Dance Festival in 2017 Estonian Youth Song and Dance Festival () is an Estonian youth festival which encompasses both: song and dance events. This youth festival is mini-variant of Estonian Song and Estonian Dance Festival. This youth festival takes place in Tallinn, Estonia and the festival is organized by Estonian Song and Dance Celebration Foundation. First festival took place from 30 June – 1 July 1962. In 2017, XII Festival took place. ==References== ==External links== Category:Music festivals in Estonia
title: Estonian Youth Song and Dance Festival
